acknowledgeSubjectEligibility.questionSubjectEligible: Is this subject eligible to enroll into this study number?
acknowledgeSubjectEligibility.comment: Comments for Subject Eligible No answer
acknowledgeSubjectEligibility.description1: Subject's eligibility status has been acknowledged by Medical Monitor and/or designee.
acknowledgeSubjectEligibility.description: By clicking 'Acknowledgement of Eligibility Status', you as the Medical Monitor are acknowledging that Clinical Logistics can move forward with approving or cancelling the work order based on the clinical site's determination of the subject's eligibility status. If there are any questions, please reach out to the site prior to clicking the button below.
